1.text:
●Scene: Mountainous Dungeon Encounter with a
Griffin

5.name: Narration
5.text:
Along with the sound of a monstrous bird, a giant
body swoops down from the sky, cutting through the
surroundings. Its physique is that of a massive
carnivorous beast, but its head is that of a
majestic eagle. Large wings, befitting its massive
body, flap on its back.

8.name: Peddler
8.text:
"Oh no, the horse is being eaten...!! Run
away...!!"

15.name: Griffin
15.text:
"Queeeeeeeee!!! (How about it? Become a female
horse with my [Var_1]!!)"

16.name: Mare
16.text:
"Neighhhhh!!! (No, please forgive meeee!!!)
(Nooo...!! I have a husband...!!) (Aaaahh!! I'm
going to get pregnant with the griffin's ●●●!!)"

18.name: Sol
18.text:
"Ooooo... Griffin NTR... The door to a new world
opens..."

20.name: Peddler
20.text:
"It seems... that griffin is in heat. Griffins in
heat, not hungry, sexually assault mares."

21.name: Peddler
21.text:
"Once it's finished mating with the mare, it will
be satisfied and leave. In fact, if we were to
interrupt the copulation, it would probably get
furious like a raging fire..."

23.name: Peddler
23.text:
"Above all, a hippogriff is born between a griffin
and a horse, so for us, it is truly a blessing..."

24.name: Erick
24.text:
"It's pitiful, but... are they asking her to
betray her husband and commit adultery here?"

25.name: Sol
25.text:
"Ooooo... A midday affair between a magical beast
and a married woman..."

34.name: Kobold
34.text:
(Thank you very much!!!) (Thank you very much,
Lord Golden Dragon!!!) (Thanks to you, our ladies
are also safe!!!)

37.name: Kobold
37.text:
(We will dedicate ourselves to serving Lady Sol.
Please allow us to take care of the surroundings.)
(No one can beat us in tunnel digging. We will
make Lady Sol's residence magnificent!)

38.name: Sol
38.text:
"Um, well then, please take care of me!! Let's get
along well, okay?!"

42.name: Narration
42.text:
At the summit of the mountain, the magical beast
lay sprawled out in an open area. Around it,
various pieces of flesh from the victims it had
likely devoured were scattered in a gruesome
manner.

43.name: Narration
43.text:
The magical beast with a human face, reveling in a
faint smile that oozed wickedness, leaped into the
air as soon as it laid eyes on Sol and the others.

44.name: Narration
44.text:
"You are the next prey. I will devour your
intestines while watching you cry out in
agony──────!!"

47.name: Narration
47.text:
The magical beast lay dying, letting out a voice
filled with agony and despair. However, it was not
even allowed that, as it received a blow from the
warrior's axe, shattering its skull.

48.name: Narration
48.text:
The magical beast, which had been convulsing for a
while, finally lost its strength, and silence fell
over the surroundings.

51.name: Kobold
51.text:
"Thank you very much!!!" "Thank you very much,
Lady Sol!!!" "Thanks to you, everyone is safe!!!"

54.name: Kobold
54.text:
"We will all serve Lady Sol. Please let us take
care of the surroundings!"

55.name: Kobold
55.text:
"We won't lose to anyone in tunnel digging. We
will make Lady Sol's residence magnificent!"

56.name: Sol
56.text:
"Um, well then, please take care of me! Let's get
along well, okay?"
